text: læa hakwa cea ca di hen khna thi phwk khea thuk hı yun xyu beuxnghna phracea khxng phwk khea doythi phraxngkh di thrng klaw wa ni michı khwam cring dxk hrux phwk khea txb wa chı khxrab phwk kha phraxngkh khx saban dwy phracea khxng phwk kha phraxngkh phraxngkh tras wa phwk cea cng lim rs kar lngthosʹ kan theid neuxngcak kar thi phwk cea ptiseth sraththa
